name: Crypt Raider
description:
Break into ancient tombs, flee from undying skeletons, dodge deadly traps and escape with the treasure!

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 48.
We highly recommend the download version, as WebGL has some issues with our lighting.

How to Play

  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - View
  • Left Mouse Button - Attack

Credits

  • Adrian Gil: 3D and VFX Art
  • Jan Pfitzer: Music Composer
  • Julian Hartinger: 2D and 3D Art
  • Julio Quiroz: Programming and Sound Design
  • Rene Rathmann: Programming and Level Design and Environment Art
  • Stefan Wolf: Programming
